sn56.96-101:4.1: “… the sentient beings who refrain from mutilation, murder, abduction, banditry, plunder, and violence are few,
sn56.96-101:4.2: while those who don’t refrain are many.
sn56.96-101:4.4: It’s because they haven’t seen the four noble truths.
sn56.96-101:4.6: The noble truths of suffering, its origin, its cessation, and the path.
sn56.96-101:5.1: That’s why you should practice meditation …”
